By 2010, black women comprised 66% of all blacks completing a bachelors degree. #CSontheair
RT @NALIP_org: The #Diverse Women in Media Residency Lab - Application opens in less than 24 hrs! #WomeninMedia http://t.co/8Nf6NAEgEm
It is hard to get young people to understand that you have to communicate a certain way in certain situations. #CSontheair
You don't have to give up who you are. But if you want to get ahead - you have to communicate in a way that fits the situation #CSontheair
Black people are being exposed to more and are becoming a threat. #CSontheair
If you have a question or comment, please feel free to call in (323) 927-2913. It is an interactive show! #CSontheair
"Whenever we trace the mother's line it always comes back African. We find that the European line comes in through men 35%" #CSontheair
I have wives call and say, "My husband stands a little taller,  walks prouder [now that he has taken the @AfricanAncestry test" #CSontheair
People view themselves differently after they take the @AfricanAncestry test #CSontheair
It is frustrating because we are now closing ourselves off but other cultures are striving forward and inviting others in. #CSontheair
The people who invited themselves, now want to close the door to others. But it is no surprise - it is white supremacy. #CSontheair
Africans lost a lot when they came to the US, but they couldn't take what was inside of them - their DNA. #CSontheair
Martin Luther King's paternal line traced back to Europe. #CSontheair
Gina was able to trace the ancestry of Martin Luther and Coretta Scott-King. #CSontheair
No one has a database that can tell you "where" in Africa, they can tell you if you have African ancestry but NOT which particular country.
But genetic ancestry doesn't require any paper, it is inside of you and unique to you. #CSontheair
Genealogy is traced through records (paper trail ) to find out the history of a particular lineage. #CSontheair
African Ancestry is the only company that can give you a African country origin. #CSontheair
Too many of us think of ourselves as descendants of slaves, instead of descendants of enslaved Africans. #CSontheairWe
We are the only group in the United States that cannot point to a country of origin. #CSontheair
"Knowledge of ancestry is critical to knowledge of self." - Gina Paige #CSontheair
African Ancestry is the premiere provider of genetic ancestry tracing for people of African descent. #CSontheair
This Friday - Lincoln Center - AfroPunk! Please be sure to check it out! #CSontheair

@lwlfilm Ethnicity is a group/individual‚Äôs conception of cultural identity and refers to cultural demarcation between and within societies.
A5 #LittleWhiteLie We need to talk difference between Race and Ethnicity and use terms correctly.Take a look: https://t.co/ufHZ6kQKLy
A5 #LittleWhiteLie The real question to pose is -- Isn't there only ONE RACE ‚Äì The Human Race? Ethnicity is the term we should be using.
